meta.title: Page Structure Checker - SEO Tools
meta.description: Analyze your webpage's structure including title, description, and heading hierarchy to ensure proper SEO optimization
meta.keywords: page structure, heading structure, seo checker, h1 tag, title tag, meta description

title: Page Structure Checker
description: Check if your webpage has a proper structure with appropriate title, description, and heading tags hierarchy

error.title: Error
error.urlRequired: Please enter a URL to analyze
error.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL (including http:// or https://)
error.networkError: Network error - please check your connection
error.timeoutError: The request timed out - the server might be busy
error.parsingError: Failed to parse the page structure

noHeadings: No heading tags found in the page
noTitle: The page does not have a title tag
noDescription: The page does not have a meta description
noH1: The page does not have an h1 tag
multipleH1: The page has multiple h1 tags (should only have one)
